name: ○ △ □ -circle triangle square
description:
This game is a physics puzzle game in which the object is to generate three types of objects (○, △, and □) to clear the problems set in each stage.

How to play
Tap or swipe the screen for easy operation!

How to play
Solve the problems in each stage by creating and using the three types of objects (○, △, and □) freely on the screen (within the limits of some stages).

There is more than one way to solve a problem.
Please find your own original way to clear the game!
